name: Grapples Galore
description:
Gameplay

Grapples Galore is a thrilling, physics-based, arena shooter focused on fast-paced grappling hook movement and active ragdolls. Use your grappling hooks to swing around, grab guns, or pull other players towards you! Grapple with your friends or with random players online!

Features

  • Online multiplayer
  • Physics-Based grappling hook movement
  • Active ragdolls
  • The ability to grapple on to other players
  • Character customization
  • Customizable matches with a wide array of match settings
